heading: Are these work challenges holding you back?
points: Feeling overwhelmed leading your team, juggling tasks, or handling tough conversations?
Worried about motivation dropping and people leaving sooner than expected?
Finding it hard to collaborate with international colleagues or build confidence in business English?
Not sure how to grow in your role, prepare for work abroad, or guide early-career staff?
Seeing stress, conflict, or burnout making work harder than it needs to be?
subtext: Whether you’re a leader, an HR professional, or just starting your career, these are common struggles across Japanese and global workplaces — and they’re exactly what I help fix.
